alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 29 at 2:59AM CDT until September 29 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...DRY AND BREEZY CONDITIONS EXPECTED ON THURSDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH WESTERN ALABAMA... The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a Red Flag Warning for South Central and South Western Alabama, which is in effect from noon today to 7 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...Northeast 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of a dry air mass and windy conditions will result in critical fire weather conditions. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
